# <kbd>:cherry_blossom: dotfiles</kbd>

This repository contains my personal dotfiles, configurations, and scripts for customizing my development environment.

```md
- os: Arch Linux
- de: Gnome
- ide: Neovim (nightly)
- terminal: WezTerm/Alacritty/Kitty
- shell: zsh/fish
- theme: catppuccin
```
